meanings.definition: To persist in a course of action or belief
meanings.sent1: She insisters on finishing her homework before playing.
meanings.sent2: He always insisters on being punctual for meetings.
meanings.sent3: The cat insisters on sitting in the sunniest spot in the house.
meanings.sent4: The flower insisters on blooming despite the harsh weather.
meanings.sent5: The determined ant insisters on carrying the heavy leaf back to its nest.

meanings.definition: Those who persist in a course of action or belief
meanings.sent1: The insisters of the team never gave up during the match.
meanings.sent2: She is one of the insisters who advocate for environmental protection.
meanings.sent3: The insisters at the protest held up signs with powerful messages.
meanings.sent4: The insisters of the book club meet every week to discuss literature.
meanings.sent5: The insisters of the community work together to make positive changes.
